pullRequest.title: Refactor pinot-batch-ingestion job specs to pinot-spi
pullRequest.bodyText:
Refactor job specs from pinot-batch-ingestion-base module to pinot-spi module
Adding IngestionJobRunner interface to be implemented by ingestion jobs.
Create a job launcher class IngestionJobLauncher in pinot-spi
Rename pinot-batch-ingestion-base to pinot-batch-ingestion-standalone and make it a plugin.

commit.message: Refactor pinot-batch-ingestion job specs to pinot-spi
